intro: “Design Process for Pros” is an e-book published in 2018. Finding this e-book comprehensive, Yu Ling Chien, Gwynne Li, and I wanted to try if it could be translated collaboratively. At the event, 20 designers translated it into Mandarin Chinese and delivered their drafts by Github. We also published a vlog, polished content, and a summary page.

worth.title: Worth Mentioning
worth.ideation: Average position for the keyword “設計流程” in Google Search result
worth.recommend: Recommendation from UX 四神湯

retro.title: Retrospect
retro.knowledge: 2 of the participants had the knowledge of version control tool: Git. The event had them experience the concept of Git by replacing sentences. I aggregated and polished the drafts after the event.
retro.obstacle: “Now I find translation challenging because of Mandarin Chinese literacy but English comprehension.”
